description:
This course is for people who want to write a book and get it published, but don't know where to start.

Led by Mindy Gibbins-Klein, founder of The Book Midwife, the modules take students on a step-by-step journey from initial idea all the way to finished and published manuscript.

Consisting of 8 modules with approximately 75 minutes of video and slides, this course will give the aspiring author a good grounding in the subject of writing a great book fast.

Message from Mindy:

I have authored and co-authored 6 books, but more importantly, my clients have written and published over 500 books!  After 10 years of working exclusively with business leaders and aspiring authors, I know quite a bit about the process of idea generation, writing, getting a book that you are happy with, and getting that book into print and selling.

I share some of my best tips and advice in these videos, and have tried to make them as friendly and accessible as possible.  Some people believe that not every book deserves to be written or published, but I believe it does.  Your book DOES deserve to be written and published, and I hope this is a good place for you to start. 

Best of luck with it and please get in touch if you have any questions or need further help!
title: How to Write a Great Book Fast
